description: This file is a Bash script providing command-line tools to manage OCI containers, including starting, stopping, listing, and executing commands inside containers. It also includes help and utility functions for container management.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts an OCI container from a bundle directory or tarball by sending a JSON-RPC request via curl.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container from a Dobby JSON specification, making a JSON-RPC request.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container via JSON-RPC request.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specific container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container with options.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays the list of available commands and their descriptions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main loop handling user input and executing corresponding container management commands.
